unauthenticated.noAccount: If you do not have a GC Forms account,
unauthenticated.title: Sign in to access responses

card.noResponsesToDownload: There are no responses available to download.

errors.trySelectingLessFilesHeader: Only {{max}} responses can be downloaded at a time.
errors.trySelectingLessFiles: You have {{max}} responses selected. Uncheck at least 1 response before downloading.
errors.atLeastOneFileHeader: At least one file must be selected to download.
errors.atLeastOneFile: Try selecting at least one file to download.
errors.errorDownloadingFiles: Try again in a few minutes. If the problem persists contact support.

confirmReceiptDialog.title: Confirm receipt of responses
confirmReceiptDialog.findCode: Find the confirmation code on the bottom of the downloaded form response. It looks like: c0c42c90-b816-49da-a69a-80bfd8ba15db.
confirmReceiptDialog.copyCode: Copy and paste up to {{max}} confirmation codes, one per line.
confirmReceiptDialog.responsesAvailableFor: After you confirm receipt, responses will be available for 7 days then automatically removed from our database.

minEntries.title: At least one response must be specified
minEntries.description: Enter confirmation codes from downloaded responses to confirm having received them.

maxEntries.title: Only {{max}} responses can be reported at a time.
maxEntries.description: Submit {{max}} confirmation codes before adding more.

errorEntries.title: Some confirmation codes could not be submitted
errorEntries.description: Check that the confirmation codes below are correct and try again.

invalidEntry.title: The confirmation code does not match the required format
invalidEntry.description: Check that the confirmation code format is correct and try again.

unknown.title: Sorry, there’s a problem with the site
unknown.description: Wait a few minutes and try again, or

reportProblemsDialog.title: Report a problem with responses
reportProblemsDialog.findForm: Find the form number in the form list for any responses that will not download or open. They look like, 31-12-XCRV.
reportProblemsDialog.enterFormNumbers: Enter up-to {{max}} form numbers, one per line.
reportProblemsDialog.problemReported: After you report the problem, we will contact you to help resolve the problem.

minEntries.title: At least one form must be specified
minEntries.description: Enter form numbers for responses that have a problem.

maxEntries.title: Only {{max}} problems can be reported at a time
maxEntries.description: Submit {{max}} form numbers before adding more.

errorEntries.title: Some form numbers were not submitted
errorEntries.description: Check that the form numbers below are correct and try again.

invalidEntry.title: The form number does not match the required format
invalidEntry.description: Check that the form number format is correct and try again.

unknown.title: Sorry, there’s a problem with the site
unknown.description: Wait a few minutes and try again, or
